AD_PartySupressionIntermezzoBeforeEmpero.synopsis: AD playing on Laezel while in the Intermezzo Astral Plane before the emperor
AD_PartySupressionIntermezzoBeforeEmpero.how_to_trigger: Click on Laezel while in the Intermezzo Astral plane before the Emperor

AD_PartySupressionIntermezzoAfterEmperor.synopsis: AD playing on Laezel while in the Intermezzo Astral Plane after the emperor
AD_PartySupressionIntermezzoAfterEmperor.how_to_trigger: Click on Laezel while in the Intermezzo Astral plane after the Emperor

AD_PartySupressionIntermezzoBeforeEmpero.speaker: Lae'zel
AD_PartySupressionIntermezzoBeforeEmpero.text: Forward. Kill who you must to survive  - even githyanki.

AD_PartySupressionIntermezzoAfterEmperor.speaker: Lae'zel
AD_PartySupressionIntermezzoAfterEmperor.text: Out of here, quickly. We'll speak after.
